title: 06/17/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/17/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's games between the Hawks/Sixers and Nets/Bucks. How much blame does Ben Simmons take for last night's loss? Chris Simms joins us to discuss his QB list. Why does he have Tom Brady 10th on the list? Nets studio Host Frank Isola explains what's different between Ben Simmons and other players who had trouble with free throws.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
